TopicTitle: How big is your friends list?

Articles.Content:
I've got 25, I believe, and counting.

I was just curious to see, because I noticed a lot of the people here have about 10 or so friends average, so I wanted to see how many friends we all have on the forums!

135.

I may be a bit friendly.
I prefer a small group of friends rather than a large one. It's like living in a small community; everyone knows each other, and there's actually clarity instead of just person after person.
Eleven - I was the one who sent them friend requests, except for one person.. I am rather lonely.
I don't add friends myself, I wait until someone else adds me. So I have 3 all together ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> 135.
> I may be a bit friendly.

May I say... \*ahem\* *DAYUM*

13. I never send friend requests on this forum. I will often accept ones that are sent, however, unless I foresee it being an issue. 

Being "friends" with people who act out and make me have to lug out the **[Punitive Great Hammer of Woe** (**+7**)**]** is weird to me... which is even weirder because a not insignificant number of people who sought me out and asked to add me as a friend soon ended up getting themselves banned or otherwise fairly heavily punished. 

I wonder if they did it intentionally -- attempted to cosy up to a moderator or two before starting to act out. Oh well. It never worked for them, in any case.

> 
> I wonder if they did it intentionally -- attempted to cosy up to a moderator or two before starting to act out.

Wouldn't surprise me. That's no different from Tyler [first chair trombonest] getting all up with Ryan [leader] during band season a few years back. And then BOOM, he proceed to be an big pile o-- [iNTERMISSION]
Like 2 or 3
Oh, some 29. Most of them came to me, I believe.
14. Pretty even mix of "I asked" and "they asked." Lots of scouts.
14 as well. Only ones I requested were InfiniteDice (when I heavily followed skillful and boatparts) and Zekes way back when.

24. I asked a few, most came to me IIRC.

As Vexx stated previously, if you send a friend request to me, and I accept, does not mean that I will let you hold/carry/observe/know how to handle/use the mythical ban hammer. The only time non-mods touch the ban hammer is when it impacts your face.

3, I've never sent a friend request, to be honest. Heck, is there anything the friends list does? I don't really use the profile at all.
